Customer.description: The customer organization associated with the rack.

_geometry_matrix.description: A 3 x 2 matrix defining the relative coordinates of a 480 mm unit representing the rack object in a 3-dimensional space.

Nbr_U.description: The number of remaining U's (rack units) in the rack.

capacity_using_power.description: The capacity of the asset in terms of power used.

capacity_using_intensity.description: The capacity of the asset in terms of intensity used.

Metrics.description: The list of metrics to monitor for the rack.

INDEnergy_consumption_rack.description: Real-time data of the electrical consumption in the rack.

INDintensity_rack.description: Real-time data of the electrical intensity in the rack.

INDCO2_emission_rack.description: Real-time data of CO2 emission rate emitted by the rack.
